snippet: The city of Venice announced Friday that the fashion entrepreneur Renzo Rosso, the founder of the OTB holding company - whose brands include Diesel, Viktor & Rolf and Martin Margiela - had donated 5 million euros (about $6.5 million) through the...
abstract: The city of Venice announced Friday that the fashion entrepreneur Renzo Rosso, the founder of the OTB holding company - whose brands include Diesel, Viktor & Rolf and Martin Margiela - had donated 5 million euros (about $6.5 million) through the company to restore the city's famed Rialto Bridge.

headline.main: Rialto Bridge in Venice to Be Restored With Corporate Money
